thread.section_title: Apartment Therapy | Saving the world, one room at a time
thread.title: Check Out Favorite Cartoon Characters, Recreated by a Drag Queen
thread.title_full: Check Out Favorite Cartoon Characters, Recreated by a Drag Queen

author: Tara Bellucci
title: Check Out Favorite Cartoon Characters, Recreated by a Drag Queen
text:
(Image credit: @phiphiohara/Instagram ) 
For anyone who's watched RuPaul's Drag Race or has seen your local queens perform in person, you know that drag is an art form. Well, here's a project that is art times 365. Last year, Phi Phi O'Hara undertook 365 Days of Drag, creating a new look and posting it to Instagram every day in 2016 (Leap Day being the exception). While they all of them were magnificent examples of her superior makeup skills, some of our favorites came in the form of beloved cartoon characters. Check out some of the best nostalgia-inducing examples below: 
You might know Phi Phi as the "villain" on season four of Drag Race, the hit reality show on Logo, or her more recent return to the workroom for All-Stars Season 2 last year, where she competed for ru-demption against nine other queens from past seasons. No matter your opinion of her on the popular show, it can't be denied that her art is impressive. 
Drag Race season four O'Hara was quite the pageant queen, but really found herself (and built a huge fanbase) when she started doing cosplay. Characters from video games, anime, and cartoons all get the Phi Phi treatment. Here are just a few of our favorites from her 365 Days of Drag project: 
Where in the world is Phi Phi O'Hara? A post shared by Phi Phi O'Hara (@phiphiohara) on Dec 31, 2016 at 9:33am PST Her take on everyone's favorite cartoon mom: A post shared by Phi Phi O'Hara (@phiphiohara) on Dec 31, 2016 at 6:01pm PST And another one with crazy hair: A post shared by Phi Phi O'Hara (@phiphiohara) on Feb 8, 2016 at 8:24am PST The most colorful cartoon character of all time: A post shared by Phi Phi O'Hara (@phiphiohara) on Apr 24, 2016 at 10:18am PDT And one of the most badass: A post shared by Phi Phi O'Hara (@phiphiohara) on Apr 30, 2016 at 9:50am PDT Glamour and glitter, fashion and fame: A post shared by Phi Phi O'Hara (@phiphiohara) on Apr 18, 2016 at 10:53am PDT There's no one we'd rather complain with: A post shared by Phi Phi O'Hara (@phiphiohara) on Feb 17, 2016 at 6:10am PST And no one rocks a unibrow quite like Phi Phi as Helga: A post shared by Phi Phi O'Hara (@phiphiohara) on Feb 13, 2016 at 8:08am PST She didn't limit characters to humans, either: A post shared by Phi Phi O'Hara (@phiphiohara) on Feb 11, 2016 at 8:04am PST Even monsters got a go: A post shared by Phi Phi O'Hara (@phiphiohara) on Feb 20, 2016 at 6:52am PST
